Set.Text: Indicates this City is the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital of the empire. Contains 1 slot for a Great Work of Art.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][ICON_CONNECTED] Connecting other Cities to the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital by Road will produce additional [ICON_GOLD] Gold.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+3 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production, +3 [ICON_RESEARCH] Science, +3 [ICON_GOLD] Gold.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+5% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production, +5% [ICON_GOLD] Gold, +5% [ICON_CULTURE] Culture.
